channel.title: How can i making a safety button for pking?
channel.description: on my piravte server u can pk everywere... but i whould like to add an safety button in ur option tab or something like that? soooo that u dont get attack by a pker intill the safety button is turned off? plus it whould get rid of the attack option can any help me in adding that to my client?

item.title: How can i making a safety button for pking?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

In case 185, when the button is pressed(168 for example), set a boolean “safety” to true. Then in the PK void, check if the player you’re attacking has safety == true, and if so, sendMessage(“The other player has saefty mode on.”)

Read full topic
